{{dcl begin}}

{{dcl|num=1|since=c++17|1=
void copy_symlink( const std::filesystem::path&amp; from,
                   const std::filesystem::path&amp; to);
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++17|1=
void copy_symlink( const std::filesystem::path&amp; from,
                   const std::filesystem::path&amp; to,
                   std::error_code&amp; ec ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Copies a symlink to another location.

@1@ Effectively calls {{c|f(read_symlink(from), to)}} where {{tt|f}} is {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/create_symlink|create_symlink}} or {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/create_symlink|create_directory_symlink}} depending on whether {{tt|from}} resolves to a file or directory.

@2@ Effectively calls {{c|f(read_symlink(from, ec), to, ec)}} where {{tt|f}} is {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/create_symlink|create_symlink}} or {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/create_symlink|create_directory_symlink}} depending on whether {{tt|from}} resolves to a file or directory.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|from|path to a symbolic link to copy}}
{{par|to|destination path of the new symlink}}
{{par|ec|out-parameter for error reporting in the non-throwing overload}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
